messages.title: More gloom with Labour and the Conservatives
messages.content: Already hiked taxes for lowest paid workers and pensioners. Tax cuts just for millionaires with the Conservatives

messages.title: IT'S A TWO HORSE RACE!
messages.content: The Conservatives and Plaid can't win in many parts of Wales. The choice is between a Lib Dem MP or a Labour MP. Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver real change and fairness.

messages.title: Who will deliver the change we need on tax?

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems are promising to remove those earning £10,000 or less from the tax system altogether. Raising tax thresholds to £10,000 a year, taking four million people out of income tax. Introducing a 'mansion tax' on houses worth over £2million to make the very rich pay their fair share.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives and Plaid can't win in many parts of Wales. The choice is between a Lib Dem MP or a Labour MP. Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver real change and fairness.

housing.content: Introducing a 'mansion tax' on houses worth over £2million.

leaflet.personalStatement: Fairer taxes that will help our country recover from the recession.

quotes.text: Fairer taxes that will help our country recover from the recession.
The proposal to take the poorest workers out of the tax system is especially worthwhile.
The party is also pledging to raise tax thresholds to £10,000 a year, taking four million people out of income tax.

images.caption: IT'S A TWO HORSE RACE! imagery.
Lib Dem fairer tax plan infographic.
